dialogues.text: Hello, adventurer. I'm looking for someone with some mining experience to help me out.
I don't think you're experienced enough yet to help me. Level 5 mining would do.
One of our mining crews has not returned from their last expedition. I would look for them myself, but I'm afraid I'm not so skilled at combat.
You will find some enemies down the mines, so you should come prepared.
Do you think you could help them out?

options.text: I sure can. Where should I look for them?

dialogues.text: Thank you! Next to the town hall, you will find the entrance to the Shamrock Mines. I expect them to be at least 1 level below the entrance level.

options.text: Should I bring anything down there?

dialogues.text: You will definitely need a pickaxe down there. You better be prepared for some combat action as well.
The crew has returned! Thank you for all your efforts, traveler! I'm glad to see them returned safely.
My crew told me they found this scroll in the mines. Perhaps you could use it.
Hi! The crew is already on their next expedition, but I have instructed them to be more careful this time.
